description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Medicine check when using the treat @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.GnEF27Oot3zqTaBQ]{Disease} and treat @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Drugs} or @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poison} tasks, and can do so with greater speed. It takes you 1 minute to treat @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.GnEF27Oot3zqTaBQ]{Disease}, and a move action to treat @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Drugs} or @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poison}. You can also attempt these tasks without a medkit, medical lab, or medical bay, though doing so takes the normal amount of time for both tasks and you do not gain the bonus to the checks.
